original_title: Rabbit Ears -  The Gingham Dog and the Calico Cat
overview: Your family will enjoy this endearing story about two Christmas presents, a dog and a cat, who fall out of Santa's sleigh. By working together—something that doesn't always come naturally—they find their way to their new home. And, through their example of love for one another, they bring harmony to an entire household.
title: Rabbit Ears -  The Gingham Dog and the Calico Cat
